attributes.action: Let Virgin Train's keep the crosscountry rail service rather than Arriva
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What possible benifit does the government believe will be had from this decision to give control to Arriva. Virgin Trains have made train journey's easier, faster and cleaner. The only thing that will happen is people will be put off travelling by train because of the ticket price increase.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
